caption:
🌷🏡 Join us for the Southwestern Indiana Builders Association Spring Tour of Homes. 🌟 This weekend, step inside the epitome of elegance with the newly constructed home at 2081 Chadwick Drive in the sought-after Bellevue Subdivision.

📆 Saturday, March 2nd & Sunday, March 3rd
⏰ 12 PM - 4 PM 

This stunning 4 bed, 3 bath masterpiece by Chris Combs of CAC Custom Homes showcases a blend of modern luxury and comforting functionality. With white oak floors, a quartz-countertop kitchen island, and stainless-steel Whirlpool appliances, every detail has been meticulously crafted for the finest living experience.

Relax by the Marfil tile fireplace, enjoy the spacious owner's suite with a deluxe bath, and unwind on your covered back porch. Don't miss experiencing the casual yet elegant lifestyle this home offers. This home is conveniently located in Newburgh that is minutes from shopping, hospitals, and great schools, and offers the finest in suburban living!

For more information, contact Team McClintock at (812) 777-5220.

Explore more about this beautiful property: TMho.me/2081-Chadwick-Dr
.
